title: I don't know why people are crying so much about Riven without even playing her
body: You should pick her and play into things like {{champion:114}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:83}} and then come back and tell me about how OP she is.

replies.body: The thing is, many people argue she feels horrible to play against. Sure, maybe she has counters but people feel like shit playing against her, therefore I do think she still needs a kneecapping.

I like how only 2 of the champions you mentioned counter her (Renekton and Yorick.) Not only that but they don't even have a great winrate against her, it's like 51% against her. Man that lane must be so tough for Riven.

Riven loses like 1 or 2 lanes, but honestly she doesn't really lose any lanes she just doesn't win all of them. I don't think Riot should nerf Riven per say, but they should definitely nerf conqueror and see where she ends up after that.

Because no matter how many game someone decides to play on a champion, it will be insignificant compared to the hundreds of thousands of games that sites like lolalytics or league of graphs compile on a weekly basis.

I have never played riven, but as long as you know what you are doing get her early game, and then scale above her. 
I sound like a pro but I'm not I just pay attention to champs and match ups. I beat a mastery 7 riven as a top sivir, anything is possible.

As a Riven main, Tryndamere and Camille are such easy matchups, but yeah once played into Darius, Teemo, or Urgot and you begin to question your purpose on Earth

Tip of the day: Stay behind but not on top of your minion waves in the early game, walk up to last hit and if they engage then stun and E away, play safer from levels 4 - 7 but abuse level advantages, btw don't play Riven into Teemo, one of the worst matchups in the entire game XD
